ygData.subject: Re: broken skills?
ygData.msgSnippet: not quite sure what you re doing wrong, but i have made a medium studded tunic before - so unless it s recently broken i m not sure what to tell you.  I know
ygData.messageBody:
not quite sure what you're doing wrong, but i have made a medium studded tunic
before - so unless it's recently broken i'm not sure what to tell you. I know
you've double and triple checked everything - but i'd make sure on the stud
count, make sure the studs are in separate spaces, not all together, right
quality of pelt, and the correct pattern. Sorry :(

Rebequa
cazic-thule

indrika@...
ICQ = 12643924
Sex on Tv can't hurt
Unless you fall off


----------
>From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQCheats] broken skills?
>Date: Thu, Aug 19, 1999, 6:38 AM
>

>From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
>Ok, last night I was trying to tailor myself a medium studded tunic. the
>first time when I follow the 'recipe' in the tailoring book I got the "does
>not combine" msg, so I tried again, triple checked the items in my sewing
>kit, made sure they weren't stacked, triple checked the book, and still got
>the same msg.
>
>I petitioned it and the guide that answered me wanted to know a lot of stuff
>name of book, exact item I was trying to make etc...
>
>is this item messed up, is the book wrong in some way? does anyone know how
>to make a medium studded tunic?
>
>I just wish I hadn't lost 2 pelts, 10 studs, and 2 patterns to the whole
>thing.
>
>thanks,
>Omeg
>
